article_title: Blind man and wife buy gun in Iowa
article_text: Michael Barber, who is blind, bought a handgun recently at Bass Pro Shop in Altoona, Iowa, with the help of his wife, Kim. Both the Barbers have passed a safety course and plan to pratice with the gun on a shooting range. Gannett/The Des Moines Register

Michael Barber, who is blind, bought a handgun recently at Bass Pro Shop in Altoona, Iowa, with the help of his wife, Kim.
Both the Barbers have passed a safety course and plan to pratice with the gun on a shooting range.
